alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 4:59PM CDT until June 11 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Richardson, or 16 miles southwest of Stuttgart, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gould... Gillett... Douglas... Richardson... Little Bayou Meto Park... Langford... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... Lodge Corner... Reydell... Sarassa... Cornerstone... Tichnor... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
